channel.title: People cant connect to my server.. through the client downloaded
channel.description:
I have made my server. Portforwarded. and put it on uppit. The only problem is my friend says "cannot connect to client please reload" how can i fix this? I really need this so people can play.
Thanks

item.title: People cant connect to my server.. through the client downloaded
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

make sure the server and client is on the port you portforwarded (ex. port 43594)

Read full topic
item.source: People cant connect to my server.. through the client downloaded

item.title: People cant connect to my server.. through the client downloaded
item.dc:creator: @Xdivinex Xdivinex
item.description:
@Xdivinex wrote:

make sure the client you uploaded the ip is set to your ip you created through no-ip… Then make sure that you have no-ip opened up on your computer if its not open then the path to your server will be closed it must be open for anyone to log on.

Read full topic
item.source: People cant connect to my server.. through the client downloaded
